reviews.review: ola o jogo e muito bom mais as vezes tem hacks e eu acho que a stem tem que tentar alguma coisa contra isso mais o jogo e muito bom recomendo

Ban system works horrible for any low specs pc person. one every like 15-20 games i dont load in in time so i get a matchmaking cooldown which stacks up to a week. since i can`t reconnect after not beeing able to load in a ban is unavoidable. This results in me pretty much beeing perma baned for litterally only not beeing able to afford a better pc.. a 7 hour ban for this specific violation would do perfectly, enough not to ruin the experience  for players with less money but still enough to make players think twice about purphously abandiing a match before start.
